11:06</p>\r\n        </td>\r\n    </tr>\r\n</table>\r\n\r\n<center>\r\n<div class=\"mon_title\">11.1.2023 Mittwoch</div>\r\n<table class=\"info\" >\r\n<tr class=\"info\"><th class=\"info\" 07e, 11, 12, Ber</td></tr>\r\n<tr class='info'><td class='info' colspan=\"2\">Die englische Theater AG muss heute leider entfallen.</td></tr>\r\n</table>\r\n<p>\r\n<table class=\"mon_list\" >\r\n<tr #010101\">Dach</span></td><td class=\"list\" align=\"center\">&nbsp;</td></tr>\r\n</table>\r\n<p>\r\n<font size=\"3\" face=\"Arial\">\r\nPeriode10   11.1.2023   23.7.2020   Stundenplan 2022-23neu\r\n</font></center>\r\n\r\n<p><center><font face=\"Arial\" size=\"2\"><a href=\"http://www.untis.at\" target=\"_blank\" >Untis Stundenplan Software</a></font></center>\r\n</body><script language=\"JavaScript\">\r\n\r\n\r\nvar system = navigator.userAgent;\r\nvar scrollVelocity = 10;\r\nvar onlyOneDirection = true;\r\nvar pageDelay = 1000;\r\nvar pageStartEndDelay = 1000;\r\n\r\nif (system.toLowerCase().indexOf('smart-tv') !== -1) {\r\n  if (system.toLowerCase().indexOf('tizen 2.4.0') !== -1) {\r\n    document.body.style.height = '100%';\r\n    window.getComputedStyle(document.body).width;\r\n    var styles = window.getComputedStyle(document.body);\r\n    var scrollHeight = document.body.scrollHeight - (document.body.offsetHeight + parseFloat(styles['marginTop']) + parseFloat(styles['marginBottom']));\r\n    var pageHeight = document.body.offsetHeight;\r\n    var scrollStep = 3;\r\n    var reverseDirection = false;\r\n    var scrollDistance = -scrollStep;\r\n    var firstStart = true;\r\n\r\n    function f() {\r\n      if (scrollVelocity === 0) {\r\n        return;\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      window.scroll(0, scrollDistance);\r\n\r\n      var nextDelay = Math.round(210 / scrollVelocity);\r\n      if (!reverseDirection) {\r\n        scrollDistance += scrollStep;\r\n        if (scrollDistance >= scrollHeight) {\r\n          if (onlyOneDirection) {\r\n            scrollDistance = -scrollStep;\r\n          } else {\r\n            reverseDirection = true;\r\n          }\r\n          nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      } else {\r\n        scrollDistance -= scrollStep;\r\n        if (scrollDistance <= 1) {\r\n          reverseDirection = false;\r\n          nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (Math.abs(scrollDistance % pageHeight) < scrollStep && scrollDistance !== 0) {\r\n        nextDelay = pageDelay;\r\n      } else if (scrollDistance === 0) {\r\n        nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n      }\r\n      setTimeout(f, nextDelay);\r\n    }\r\n    requestAnimationFrame(f);\r\n  } else {\r\n\t// Automatic scrolling stuff\r\n    var body = document.body, html = document.documentElement;\r\n    var pageHeight = Math.max(body.scrollHeight, body.offsetHeight, html.clientHeight, html.scrollHeight, html.offsetHeight);\r\n    var windowHeight = window.innerHeight || body.clientHeight;\r\n    var scrollSteps = Math.ceil(pageHeight / windowHeight);\r\n    var step = 0;\r\n    var dir = 'down';\r\n    var prevScrollDistance = 0;\r\n    var mydelay = 0;\r\n    var initialStep = true;\r\n    var animationCanRun = true;\r\n\r\n    // Manual scrolling stuff\r\n    var startPos = { x: 0, y: 0 };\r\n    var offsetPos = { x: 0, y: 0 };\r\n    var oldTransition = null;\r\n    var startTransform = null;\r\n    var newTransformY = 0;\r\n    var touchMoveTimer = null;\r\n    var maxTouchMoveDistance = document.body.offsetHeight - window.innerHeight + 20;\r\n    var delayAfterManualTouch = 10;\r\n\r\n    // Add styles to prevent blurry text\r\n    document.body.style.backfaceVisibility = 'hidden';\r\n    document.body.style.webkitFontSmoothing = 'antialiased';\r\n    document.body.style.fontSmoothing = 'antialiased';\r\n    document.body.style.transform = 'translateZ(0)';\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchstart', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      animationCanRun = false;\r\n      touchMove = true;\r\n      startTransform = window.getComputedStyle(document.body).getPropertyValue('transform');\r\n\r\n      // Set start position of touchmove\r\n      startPos.y = e.touches[0].pageY;\r\n      \r\n      // Cache transition state\r\n      oldTransition = document.body.style.transition;\r\n      // Remove current transition and set transform to current position\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransform = startTransform + '';\r\n      document.body.style.transform = startTransform + '';\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'transform 0s linear';\r\n      document.body.style.transition = 'transform 0s linear';\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchmove', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      offsetPos.y = startPos.y - e.touches[0].pageY;\r\n      var lastTransformPos = startTransform.toLowerCase().split(',')[5];\r\n      if (lastTransformPos) {\r\n        lastTransformPos = lastTransformPos.replace(')', '');\r\n      }\r\n      lastTransformPos -= offsetPos.y;\r\n      newTransformY = lastTransformPos;\r\n      if (!isNaN(newTransformY) && newTransformY < 20 && newTransformY > -(maxTouchMoveDistance)) {\t\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, ' + newTransformY + ')';\r\n        document.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, ' + newTransformY + ')';\r\n      } else if (isNaN(newTransformY) && -offsetPos.y < 20 && -offsetPos.y > -(maxTouchMoveDistance)) {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -' + offsetPos.y + ')';\r\n        document.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -' + offsetPos.y + ')';\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (touchMoveTimer !== null) {\r\n        clearTimeout(touchMoveTimer)\r\n      }\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchend', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      touchMoveTimer = setTimeout(function() {\r\n        animationCanRun = true;\r\n        clearTimeout(touchMoveTimer);\r\n        restartAnimation();\r\n      }, delayAfterManualTouch * 1000);\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    function fNew() {\r\n      if (scrollSteps <= 0 || windowHeight >= pageHeight) return;\r\n\t    if (!animationCanRun) return;\r\n\r\n      if (initialStep && step === 0) {\r\n        step = 1;\r\n        initialStep = false;\r\n      } else {\r\n        if (dir === 'down') {\r\n          if (step + 1 < scrollSteps) {\r\n            step++;\r\n          } else {\r\n            if (onlyOneDirection) {\r\n              step = 0;\r\n            } else {\r\n              step--;\r\n            }\r\n            dir = 'up';\r\n          }\r\n        } else if (dir === 'up') {\r\n          if (step - 1 >= 0) {\r\n            step--;\r\n          } else {\r\n            step++;\r\n            dir = 'down';\r\n          }\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      var curStepDestination = step * windowHeight;\r\n\r\n      if (step === scrollSteps - 1) {\r\n        var diff = pageHeight - ((step) * windowHeight);\r\n        realHeight = (step - 1) * windowHeight + diff + 20; // 20px safety margin\r\n        if (realHeight > 0) {\r\n          curStepDestination = realHeight;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      var speed = 3 / (210 / scrollVelocity)\r\n\r\n      var animationduration = Math.abs(curStepDestination - prevScrollDistance) / (630 * speed);\r\n      prevScrollDistance = curStepDestination;\r\n\r\n      if (onlyOneDirection && dir === 'up') {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'initial';\r\n        document.body.style.transition = 'initial';\r\n      } else {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'transform ' + animationduration + 's linear';\r\n        document.body.style.transition = 'transform ' + animationduration + 's linear';\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'translateZ(0) translateY(-' + curStepDestination + 'px)';\r\n      document.body.style.transform = 'translateZ(0) translateY(-' + curStepDestination + 'px)';\r\n\r\n      var newDelay = 0;\r\n      mydelay = pageDelay;\r\n\r\n      if (dir === 'down') {\r\n        if (step === scrollSteps - 1) {\r\n          mydelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      } else {\r\n        if (step === 0) {\r\n          mydelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (onlyOneDirection && dir === 'up') {\r\n        newDelay = mydelay;\r\n      } else {\r\n        newDelay = mydelay + (animationduration * 1000);\r\n\t  }\r\n\t  if (!animationCanRun) return;\r\n      setTimeout(fNew, newDelay);\r\n    }\r\n    setTimeout(function () {\r\n      fNew();\r\n\t\t}, pageDelay);\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\tfunction restartAnimation() {\r\n\t\t\tdocument.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0)';\r\n\t\t\tdocument.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0)';\r\n\t\t\tstep = 0;\r\n\t\t\tdir = 'down';\r\n\t\t\tprevScrollDistance = 0;\r\n\t\t\tmydelay = 0;\r\n      initialStep = true;\r\n      setTimeout(function() {\r\n\t\t\t  fNew();\r\n      }, 500);\r\n\t\t}\r\n  }\r\n}\r\n</script>\r\n</body></html>",

align=\"center\">&nbsp;</td></tr>\r\n</table>\r\n<p>\r\n<font size=\"3\" face=\"Arial\">\r\nPeriode10   12.1.2023   23.7.2020   Stundenplan 2022-23neu\r\n</font></center>\r\n\r\n<p><center><font face=\"Arial\" size=\"2\"><a href=\"http://www.untis.at\" target=\"_blank\" >Untis Stundenplan Software</a></font></center>\r\n</body><script language=\"JavaScript\">\r\n\r\n\r\nvar system = navigator.userAgent;\r\nvar scrollVelocity = 10;\r\nvar onlyOneDirection = true;\r\nvar pageDelay = 1000;\r\nvar pageStartEndDelay = 1000;\r\n\r\nif (system.toLowerCase().indexOf('smart-tv') !== -1) {\r\n  if (system.toLowerCase().indexOf('tizen 2.4.0') !== -1) {\r\n    document.body.style.height = '100%';\r\n    window.getComputedStyle(document.body).width;\r\n    var styles = window.getComputedStyle(document.body);\r\n    var scrollHeight = document.body.scrollHeight - (document.body.offsetHeight + parseFloat(styles['marginTop']) + parseFloat(styles['marginBottom']));\r\n    var pageHeight = document.body.offsetHeight;\r\n    var scrollStep = 3;\r\n    var reverseDirection = false;\r\n    var scrollDistance = -scrollStep;\r\n    var firstStart = true;\r\n\r\n    function f() {\r\n      if (scrollVelocity === 0) {\r\n        return;\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      window.scroll(0, scrollDistance);\r\n\r\n      var nextDelay = Math.round(210 / scrollVelocity);\r\n      if (!reverseDirection) {\r\n        scrollDistance += scrollStep;\r\n        if (scrollDistance >= scrollHeight) {\r\n          if (onlyOneDirection) {\r\n            scrollDistance = -scrollStep;\r\n          } else {\r\n            reverseDirection = true;\r\n          }\r\n          nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      } else {\r\n        scrollDistance -= scrollStep;\r\n        if (scrollDistance <= 1) {\r\n          reverseDirection = false;\r\n          nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (Math.abs(scrollDistance % pageHeight) < scrollStep && scrollDistance !== 0) {\r\n        nextDelay = pageDelay;\r\n      } else if (scrollDistance === 0) {\r\n        nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n      }\r\n      setTimeout(f, nextDelay);\r\n    }\r\n    requestAnimationFrame(f);\r\n  } else {\r\n\t// Automatic scrolling stuff\r\n    var body = document.body, html = document.documentElement;\r\n    var pageHeight = Math.max(body.scrollHeight, body.offsetHeight, html.clientHeight, html.scrollHeight, html.offsetHeight);\r\n    var windowHeight = window.innerHeight || body.clientHeight;\r\n    var scrollSteps = Math.ceil(pageHeight / windowHeight);\r\n    var step = 0;\r\n    var dir = 'down';\r\n    var prevScrollDistance = 0;\r\n    var mydelay = 0;\r\n    var initialStep = true;\r\n    var animationCanRun = true;\r\n\r\n    // Manual scrolling stuff\r\n    var startPos = { x: 0, y: 0 };\r\n    var offsetPos = { x: 0, y: 0 };\r\n    var oldTransition = null;\r\n    var startTransform = null;\r\n    var newTransformY = 0;\r\n    var touchMoveTimer = null;\r\n    var maxTouchMoveDistance = document.body.offsetHeight - window.innerHeight + 20;\r\n    var delayAfterManualTouch = 10;\r\n\r\n    // Add styles to prevent blurry text\r\n    document.body.style.backfaceVisibility = 'hidden';\r\n    document.body.style.webkitFontSmoothing = 'antialiased';\r\n    document.body.style.fontSmoothing = 'antialiased';\r\n    document.body.style.transform = 'translateZ(0)';\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchstart', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      animationCanRun = false;\r\n      touchMove = true;\r\n      startTransform = window.getComputedStyle(document.body).getPropertyValue('transform');\r\n\r\n      // Set start position of touchmove\r\n      startPos.y = e.touches[0].pageY;\r\n      \r\n      // Cache transition state\r\n      oldTransition = document.body.style.transition;\r\n      // Remove current transition and set transform to current position\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransform = startTransform + '';\r\n      document.body.style.transform = startTransform + '';\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'transform 0s linear';\r\n      document.body.style.transition = 'transform 0s linear';\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchmove', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      offsetPos.y = startPos.y - e.touches[0].pageY;\r\n      var lastTransformPos = startTransform.toLowerCase().split(',')[5];\r\n      if (lastTransformPos) {\r\n        lastTransformPos = lastTransformPos.replace(')', '');\r\n      }\r\n      lastTransformPos -= offsetPos.y;\r\n      newTransformY = lastTransformPos;\r\n      if (!isNaN(newTransformY) && newTransformY < 20 && newTransformY > -(maxTouchMoveDistance)) {\t\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, ' + newTransformY + ')';\r\n        document.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, ' + newTransformY + ')';\r\n      } else if (isNaN(newTransformY) && -offsetPos.y < 20 && -offsetPos.y > -(maxTouchMoveDistance)) {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -' + offsetPos.y + ')';\r\n        document.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -' + offsetPos.y + ')';\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (touchMoveTimer !== null) {\r\n        clearTimeout(touchMoveTimer)\r\n      }\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchend', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      touchMoveTimer = setTimeout(function() {\r\n        animationCanRun = true;\r\n        clearTimeout(touchMoveTimer);\r\n        restartAnimation();\r\n      }, delayAfterManualTouch * 1000);\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    function fNew() {\r\n      if (scrollSteps <= 0 || windowHeight >= pageHeight) return;\r\n\t    if (!animationCanRun) return;\r\n\r\n      if (initialStep && step === 0) {\r\n        step = 1;\r\n        initialStep = false;\r\n      } else {\r\n        if (dir === 'down') {\r\n          if (step + 1 < scrollSteps) {\r\n            step++;\r\n          } else {\r\n            if (onlyOneDirection) {\r\n              step = 0;\r\n            } else {\r\n              step--;\r\n            }\r\n            dir = 'up';\r\n          }\r\n        } else if (dir === 'up') {\r\n          if (step - 1 >= 0) {\r\n            step--;\r\n          } else {\r\n            step++;\r\n            dir = 'down';\r\n          }\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      var curStepDestination = step * windowHeight;\r\n\r\n      if (step === scrollSteps - 1) {\r\n        var diff = pageHeight - ((step) * windowHeight);\r\n        realHeight = (step - 1) * windowHeight + diff + 20; // 20px safety margin\r\n        if (realHeight > 0) {\r\n          curStepDestination = realHeight;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      var speed = 3 / (210 / scrollVelocity)\r\n\r\n      var animationduration = Math.abs(curStepDestination - prevScrollDistance) / (630 * speed);\r\n      prevScrollDistance = curStepDestination;\r\n\r\n      if (onlyOneDirection && dir === 'up') {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'initial';\r\n        document.body.style.transition = 'initial';\r\n      } else {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'transform ' + animationduration + 's linear';\r\n        document.body.style.transition = 'transform ' + animationduration + 's linear';\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'translateZ(0) translateY(-' + curStepDestination + 'px)';\r\n      document.body.style.transform = 'translateZ(0) translateY(-' + curStepDestination + 'px)';\r\n\r\n      var newDelay = 0;\r\n      mydelay = pageDelay;\r\n\r\n      if (dir === 'down') {\r\n        if (step === scrollSteps - 1) {\r\n          mydelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      } else {\r\n        if (step === 0) {\r\n          mydelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (onlyOneDirection && dir === 'up') {\r\n        newDelay = mydelay;\r\n      } else {\r\n        newDelay = mydelay + (animationduration * 1000);\r\n\t  }\r\n\t  if (!animationCanRun) return;\r\n      setTimeout(fNew, newDelay);\r\n    }\r\n    setTimeout(function () {\r\n      fNew();\r\n\t\t}, pageDelay);\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\tfunction restartAnimation() {\r\n\t\t\tdocument.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0)';\r\n\t\t\tdocument.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0)';\r\n\t\t\tstep = 0;\r\n\t\t\tdir = 'down';\r\n\t\t\tprevScrollDistance = 0;\r\n\t\t\tmydelay = 0;\r\n      initialStep = true;\r\n      setTimeout(function() {\r\n\t\t\t  fNew();\r\n      }, 500);\r\n\t\t}\r\n  }\r\n}\r\n</script>\r\n</body></html>",
    "2023-01-11": "<html><head><meta http-equiv=\"Content-Type\" content=\"text/html;\"><style type=\"text/css\">\r\n\r\nbody { margin-top: 0px; margin-left: 20px; margin-right: 20px;\r\nbackground: bold; \r\n\tfont-size: 120%; \r\n\tclear: both; \r\n\tmargin: 0; \r\n}\r\n\r\n.inline_header\r\n{\r\n\tfont-weight: bold; \r\n}\r\n\r\ntable.info\r\n{\r\n\tcolor: #000000; \r\n\tfont-size: 2022-23neu\r\n</font></center>\r\n\r\n<p><center><font face=\"Arial\" size=\"2\"><a href=\"http://www.untis.at\" target=\"_blank\" >Untis Stundenplan Software</a></font></center>\r\n</body><script language=\"JavaScript\">\r\n\r\n\r\nvar system = navigator.userAgent;\r\nvar scrollVelocity = 10;\r\nvar onlyOneDirection = true;\r\nvar pageDelay = 1000;\r\nvar pageStartEndDelay = 1000;\r\n\r\nif (system.toLowerCase().indexOf('smart-tv') !== -1) {\r\n  if (system.toLowerCase().indexOf('tizen 2.4.0') !== -1) {\r\n    document.body.style.height = '100%';\r\n    window.getComputedStyle(document.body).width;\r\n    var styles = window.getComputedStyle(document.body);\r\n    var scrollHeight = document.body.scrollHeight - (document.body.offsetHeight + parseFloat(styles['marginTop']) + parseFloat(styles['marginBottom']));\r\n    var pageHeight = document.body.offsetHeight;\r\n    var scrollStep = 3;\r\n    var reverseDirection = false;\r\n    var scrollDistance = -scrollStep;\r\n    var firstStart = true;\r\n\r\n    function f() {\r\n      if (scrollVelocity === 0) {\r\n        return;\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      window.scroll(0, scrollDistance);\r\n\r\n      var nextDelay = Math.round(210 / scrollVelocity);\r\n      if (!reverseDirection) {\r\n        scrollDistance += scrollStep;\r\n        if (scrollDistance >= scrollHeight) {\r\n          if (onlyOneDirection) {\r\n            scrollDistance = -scrollStep;\r\n          } else {\r\n            reverseDirection = true;\r\n          }\r\n          nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      } else {\r\n        scrollDistance -= scrollStep;\r\n        if (scrollDistance <= 1) {\r\n          reverseDirection = false;\r\n          nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (Math.abs(scrollDistance % pageHeight) < scrollStep && scrollDistance !== 0) {\r\n        nextDelay = pageDelay;\r\n      } else if (scrollDistance === 0) {\r\n        nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n      }\r\n      setTimeout(f, nextDelay);\r\n    }\r\n    requestAnimationFrame(f);\r\n  } else {\r\n\t// Automatic scrolling stuff\r\n    var body = document.body, html = document.documentElement;\r\n    var pageHeight = Math.max(body.scrollHeight, body.offsetHeight, html.clientHeight, html.scrollHeight, html.offsetHeight);\r\n    var windowHeight = window.innerHeight || body.clientHeight;\r\n    var scrollSteps = Math.ceil(pageHeight / windowHeight);\r\n    var step = 0;\r\n    var dir = 'down';\r\n    var prevScrollDistance = 0;\r\n    var mydelay = 0;\r\n    var initialStep = true;\r\n    var animationCanRun = true;\r\n\r\n    // Manual scrolling stuff\r\n    var startPos = { x: 0, y: 0 };\r\n    var offsetPos = { x: 0, y: 0 };\r\n    var oldTransition = null;\r\n    var startTransform = null;\r\n    var newTransformY = 0;\r\n    var touchMoveTimer = null;\r\n    var maxTouchMoveDistance = document.body.offsetHeight - window.innerHeight + 20;\r\n    var delayAfterManualTouch = 10;\r\n\r\n    // Add styles to prevent blurry text\r\n    document.body.style.backfaceVisibility = 'hidden';\r\n    document.body.style.webkitFontSmoothing = 'antialiased';\r\n    document.body.style.fontSmoothing = 'antialiased';\r\n    document.body.style.transform = 'translateZ(0)';\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchstart', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      animationCanRun = false;\r\n      touchMove = true;\r\n      startTransform = window.getComputedStyle(document.body).getPropertyValue('transform');\r\n\r\n      // Set start position of touchmove\r\n      startPos.y = e.touches[0].pageY;\r\n      \r\n      // Cache transition state\r\n      oldTransition = document.body.style.transition;\r\n      // Remove current transition and set transform to current position\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransform = startTransform + '';\r\n      document.body.style.transform = startTransform + '';\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'transform 0s linear';\r\n      document.body.style.transition = 'transform 0s linear';\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchmove', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      offsetPos.y = startPos.y - e.touches[0].pageY;\r\n      var lastTransformPos = startTransform.toLowerCase().split(',')[5];\r\n      if (lastTransformPos) {\r\n        lastTransformPos = lastTransformPos.replace(')', '');\r\n      }\r\n      lastTransformPos -= offsetPos.y;\r\n      newTransformY = lastTransformPos;\r\n      if (!isNaN(newTransformY) && newTransformY < 20 && newTransformY > -(maxTouchMoveDistance)) {\t\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, ' + newTransformY + ')';\r\n        document.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, ' + newTransformY + ')';\r\n      } else if (isNaN(newTransformY) && -offsetPos.y < 20 && -offsetPos.y > -(maxTouchMoveDistance)) {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -' + offsetPos.y + ')';\r\n        document.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -' + offsetPos.y + ')';\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (touchMoveTimer !== null) {\r\n        clearTimeout(touchMoveTimer)\r\n      }\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchend', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      touchMoveTimer = setTimeout(function() {\r\n        animationCanRun = true;\r\n        clearTimeout(touchMoveTimer);\r\n        restartAnimation();\r\n      }, delayAfterManualTouch * 1000);\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    function fNew() {\r\n      if (scrollSteps <= 0 || windowHeight >= pageHeight) return;\r\n\t    if (!animationCanRun) return;\r\n\r\n      if (initialStep && step === 0) {\r\n        step = 1;\r\n        initialStep = false;\r\n      } else {\r\n        if (dir === 'down') {\r\n          if (step + 1 < scrollSteps) {\r\n            step++;\r\n          } else {\r\n            if (onlyOneDirection) {\r\n              step = 0;\r\n            } else {\r\n              step--;\r\n            }\r\n            dir = 'up';\r\n          }\r\n        } else if (dir === 'up') {\r\n          if (step - 1 >= 0) {\r\n            step--;\r\n          } else {\r\n            step++;\r\n            dir = 'down';\r\n          }\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      var curStepDestination = step * windowHeight;\r\n\r\n      if (step === scrollSteps - 1) {\r\n        var diff = pageHeight - ((step) * windowHeight);\r\n        realHeight = (step - 1) * windowHeight + diff + 20; // 20px safety margin\r\n        if (realHeight > 0) {\r\n          curStepDestination = realHeight;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      var speed = 3 / (210 / scrollVelocity)\r\n\r\n      var animationduration = Math.abs(curStepDestination - prevScrollDistance) / (630 * speed);\r\n      prevScrollDistance = curStepDestination;\r\n\r\n      if (onlyOneDirection && dir === 'up') {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'initial';\r\n        document.body.style.transition = 'initial';\r\n      } else {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'transform ' + animationduration + 's linear';\r\n        document.body.style.transition = 'transform ' + animationduration + 's linear';\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'translateZ(0) translateY(-' + curStepDestination + 'px)';\r\n      document.body.style.transform = 'translateZ(0) translateY(-' + curStepDestination + 'px)';\r\n\r\n      var newDelay = 0;\r\n      mydelay = pageDelay;\r\n\r\n      if (dir === 'down') {\r\n        if (step === scrollSteps - 1) {\r\n          mydelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      } else {\r\n        if (step === 0) {\r\n          mydelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (onlyOneDirection && dir === 'up') {\r\n        newDelay = mydelay;\r\n      } else {\r\n        newDelay = mydelay + (animationduration * 1000);\r\n\t  }\r\n\t  if (!animationCanRun) return;\r\n      setTimeout(fNew, newDelay);\r\n    }\r\n    setTimeout(function () {\r\n      fNew();\r\n\t\t}, pageDelay);\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\tfunction restartAnimation() {\r\n\t\t\tdocument.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0)';\r\n\t\t\tdocument.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0)';\r\n\t\t\tstep = 0;\r\n\t\t\tdir = 'down';\r\n\t\t\tprevScrollDistance = 0;\r\n\t\t\tmydelay = 0;\r\n      initialStep = true;\r\n      setTimeout(function() {\r\n\t\t\t  fNew();\r\n      }, 500);\r\n\t\t}\r\n  }\r\n}\r\n</script>\r\n</body></html>",

align=\"center\"><span style=\"color: #010101\">Treppe</span></td><td class=\"list\" align=\"center\"><span style=\"color: #010101\">Pausenaufsicht</span></td><td class=\"list\" align=\"center\"><span align=\"center\">&nbsp;</td></tr>\r\n</table>\r\n<p>\r\n<font size=\"3\" face=\"Arial\">\r\nPeriode10   16.1.2023   23.7.2020   Stundenplan 2022-23neu\r\n</font></center>\r\n\r\n<p><center><font face=\"Arial\" size=\"2\"><a href=\"http://www.untis.at\" target=\"_blank\" >Untis Stundenplan Software</a></font></center>\r\n</body><script language=\"JavaScript\">\r\n\r\n\r\nvar system = navigator.userAgent;\r\nvar scrollVelocity = 10;\r\nvar onlyOneDirection = true;\r\nvar pageDelay = 1000;\r\nvar pageStartEndDelay = 1000;\r\n\r\nif (system.toLowerCase().indexOf('smart-tv') !== -1) {\r\n  if (system.toLowerCase().indexOf('tizen 2.4.0') !== -1) {\r\n    document.body.style.height = '100%';\r\n    window.getComputedStyle(document.body).width;\r\n    var styles = window.getComputedStyle(document.body);\r\n    var scrollHeight = document.body.scrollHeight - (document.body.offsetHeight + parseFloat(styles['marginTop']) + parseFloat(styles['marginBottom']));\r\n    var pageHeight = document.body.offsetHeight;\r\n    var scrollStep = 3;\r\n    var reverseDirection = false;\r\n    var scrollDistance = -scrollStep;\r\n    var firstStart = true;\r\n\r\n    function f() {\r\n      if (scrollVelocity === 0) {\r\n        return;\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      window.scroll(0, scrollDistance);\r\n\r\n      var nextDelay = Math.round(210 / scrollVelocity);\r\n      if (!reverseDirection) {\r\n        scrollDistance += scrollStep;\r\n        if (scrollDistance >= scrollHeight) {\r\n          if (onlyOneDirection) {\r\n            scrollDistance = -scrollStep;\r\n          } else {\r\n            reverseDirection = true;\r\n          }\r\n          nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      } else {\r\n        scrollDistance -= scrollStep;\r\n        if (scrollDistance <= 1) {\r\n          reverseDirection = false;\r\n          nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (Math.abs(scrollDistance % pageHeight) < scrollStep && scrollDistance !== 0) {\r\n        nextDelay = pageDelay;\r\n      } else if (scrollDistance === 0) {\r\n        nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n      }\r\n      setTimeout(f, nextDelay);\r\n    }\r\n    requestAnimationFrame(f);\r\n  } else {\r\n\t// Automatic scrolling stuff\r\n    var body = document.body, html = document.documentElement;\r\n    var pageHeight = Math.max(body.scrollHeight, body.offsetHeight, html.clientHeight, html.scrollHeight, html.offsetHeight);\r\n    var windowHeight = window.innerHeight || body.clientHeight;\r\n    var scrollSteps = Math.ceil(pageHeight / windowHeight);\r\n    var step = 0;\r\n    var dir = 'down';\r\n    var prevScrollDistance = 0;\r\n    var mydelay = 0;\r\n    var initialStep = true;\r\n    var animationCanRun = true;\r\n\r\n    // Manual scrolling stuff\r\n    var startPos = { x: 0, y: 0 };\r\n    var offsetPos = { x: 0, y: 0 };\r\n    var oldTransition = null;\r\n    var startTransform = null;\r\n    var newTransformY = 0;\r\n    var touchMoveTimer = null;\r\n    var maxTouchMoveDistance = document.body.offsetHeight - window.innerHeight + 20;\r\n    var delayAfterManualTouch = 10;\r\n\r\n    // Add styles to prevent blurry text\r\n    document.body.style.backfaceVisibility = 'hidden';\r\n    document.body.style.webkitFontSmoothing = 'antialiased';\r\n    document.body.style.fontSmoothing = 'antialiased';\r\n    document.body.style.transform = 'translateZ(0)';\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchstart', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      animationCanRun = false;\r\n      touchMove = true;\r\n      startTransform = window.getComputedStyle(document.body).getPropertyValue('transform');\r\n\r\n      // Set start position of touchmove\r\n      startPos.y = e.touches[0].pageY;\r\n      \r\n      // Cache transition state\r\n      oldTransition = document.body.style.transition;\r\n      // Remove current transition and set transform to current position\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransform = startTransform + '';\r\n      document.body.style.transform = startTransform + '';\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'transform 0s linear';\r\n      document.body.style.transition = 'transform 0s linear';\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchmove', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      offsetPos.y = startPos.y - e.touches[0].pageY;\r\n      var lastTransformPos = startTransform.toLowerCase().split(',')[5];\r\n      if (lastTransformPos) {\r\n        lastTransformPos = lastTransformPos.replace(')', '');\r\n      }\r\n      lastTransformPos -= offsetPos.y;\r\n      newTransformY = lastTransformPos;\r\n      if (!isNaN(newTransformY) && newTransformY < 20 && newTransformY > -(maxTouchMoveDistance)) {\t\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, ' + newTransformY + ')';\r\n        document.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, ' + newTransformY + ')';\r\n      } else if (isNaN(newTransformY) && -offsetPos.y < 20 && -offsetPos.y > -(maxTouchMoveDistance)) {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -' + offsetPos.y + ')';\r\n        document.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -' + offsetPos.y + ')';\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (touchMoveTimer !== null) {\r\n        clearTimeout(touchMoveTimer)\r\n      }\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchend', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      touchMoveTimer = setTimeout(function() {\r\n        animationCanRun = true;\r\n        clearTimeout(touchMoveTimer);\r\n        restartAnimation();\r\n      }, delayAfterManualTouch * 1000);\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    function fNew() {\r\n      if (scrollSteps <= 0 || windowHeight >= pageHeight) return;\r\n\t    if (!animationCanRun) return;\r\n\r\n      if (initialStep && step === 0) {\r\n        step = 1;\r\n        initialStep = false;\r\n      } else {\r\n        if (dir === 'down') {\r\n          if (step + 1 < scrollSteps) {\r\n            step++;\r\n          } else {\r\n            if (onlyOneDirection) {\r\n              step = 0;\r\n            } else {\r\n              step--;\r\n            }\r\n            dir = 'up';\r\n          }\r\n        } else if (dir === 'up') {\r\n          if (step - 1 >= 0) {\r\n            step--;\r\n          } else {\r\n            step++;\r\n            dir = 'down';\r\n          }\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      var curStepDestination = step * windowHeight;\r\n\r\n      if (step === scrollSteps - 1) {\r\n        var diff = pageHeight - ((step) * windowHeight);\r\n        realHeight = (step - 1) * windowHeight + diff + 20; // 20px safety margin\r\n        if (realHeight > 0) {\r\n          curStepDestination = realHeight;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      var speed = 3 / (210 / scrollVelocity)\r\n\r\n      var animationduration = Math.abs(curStepDestination - prevScrollDistance) / (630 * speed);\r\n      prevScrollDistance = curStepDestination;\r\n\r\n      if (onlyOneDirection && dir === 'up') {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'initial';\r\n        document.body.style.transition = 'initial';\r\n      } else {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'transform ' + animationduration + 's linear';\r\n        document.body.style.transition = 'transform ' + animationduration + 's linear';\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'translateZ(0) translateY(-' + curStepDestination + 'px)';\r\n      document.body.style.transform = 'translateZ(0) translateY(-' + curStepDestination + 'px)';\r\n\r\n      var newDelay = 0;\r\n      mydelay = pageDelay;\r\n\r\n      if (dir === 'down') {\r\n        if (step === scrollSteps - 1) {\r\n          mydelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      } else {\r\n        if (step === 0) {\r\n          mydelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (onlyOneDirection && dir === 'up') {\r\n        newDelay = mydelay;\r\n      } else {\r\n        newDelay = mydelay + (animationduration * 1000);\r\n\t  }\r\n\t  if (!animationCanRun) return;\r\n      setTimeout(fNew, newDelay);\r\n    }\r\n    setTimeout(function () {\r\n      fNew();\r\n\t\t}, pageDelay);\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\tfunction restartAnimation() {\r\n\t\t\tdocument.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0)';\r\n\t\t\tdocument.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0)';\r\n\t\t\tstep = 0;\r\n\t\t\tdir = 'down';\r\n\t\t\tprevScrollDistance = 0;\r\n\t\t\tmydelay = 0;\r\n      initialStep = true;\r\n      setTimeout(function() {\r\n\t\t\t  fNew();\r\n      }, 500);\r\n\t\t}\r\n  }\r\n}\r\n</script>\r\n</body></html>",
    "2023-01-13": "<html><head><meta http-equiv=\"Content-Type\" content=\"text/html;\"><style type=\"text/css\">\r\n\r\nbody { margin-top: 0px; margin-left: 20px; margin-right: 20px;\r\nbackground: OG</span></td><td class=\"list\" align=\"center\"><strike><span style=\"color: #010101\">Entfall</span></strike></td><td class=\"list\" align=\"center\"><span style=\"color: #010101\">Ki</span></td><td class=\"list\" align=\"center\"><span style=\"color: #010101\">2. OG</span></td><td class=\"list\" align=\"center\">&nbsp;</td></tr>\r\n</table>\r\n<p>\r\n<font size=\"3\" face=\"Arial\">\r\nPeriode10   17.1.2023   23.7.2020   Stundenplan 2022-23neu\r\n</font></center>\r\n\r\n<p><center><font face=\"Arial\" size=\"2\"><a href=\"http://www.untis.at\" target=\"_blank\" >Untis Stundenplan Software</a></font></center>\r\n</body><script language=\"JavaScript\">\r\n\r\n\r\nvar system = navigator.userAgent;\r\nvar scrollVelocity = 10;\r\nvar onlyOneDirection = true;\r\nvar pageDelay = 1000;\r\nvar pageStartEndDelay = 1000;\r\n\r\nif (system.toLowerCase().indexOf('smart-tv') !== -1) {\r\n  if (system.toLowerCase().indexOf('tizen 2.4.0') !== -1) {\r\n    document.body.style.height = '100%';\r\n    window.getComputedStyle(document.body).width;\r\n    var styles = window.getComputedStyle(document.body);\r\n    var scrollHeight = document.body.scrollHeight - (document.body.offsetHeight + parseFloat(styles['marginTop']) + parseFloat(styles['marginBottom']));\r\n    var pageHeight = document.body.offsetHeight;\r\n    var scrollStep = 3;\r\n    var reverseDirection = false;\r\n    var scrollDistance = -scrollStep;\r\n    var firstStart = true;\r\n\r\n    function f() {\r\n      if (scrollVelocity === 0) {\r\n        return;\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      window.scroll(0, scrollDistance);\r\n\r\n      var nextDelay = Math.round(210 / scrollVelocity);\r\n      if (!reverseDirection) {\r\n        scrollDistance += scrollStep;\r\n        if (scrollDistance >= scrollHeight) {\r\n          if (onlyOneDirection) {\r\n            scrollDistance = -scrollStep;\r\n          } else {\r\n            reverseDirection = true;\r\n          }\r\n          nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      } else {\r\n        scrollDistance -= scrollStep;\r\n        if (scrollDistance <= 1) {\r\n          reverseDirection = false;\r\n          nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (Math.abs(scrollDistance % pageHeight) < scrollStep && scrollDistance !== 0) {\r\n        nextDelay = pageDelay;\r\n      } else if (scrollDistance === 0) {\r\n        nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n      }\r\n      setTimeout(f, nextDelay);\r\n    }\r\n    requestAnimationFrame(f);\r\n  } else {\r\n\t// Automatic scrolling stuff\r\n    var body = document.body, html = document.documentElement;\r\n    var pageHeight = Math.max(body.scrollHeight, body.offsetHeight, html.clientHeight, html.scrollHeight, html.offsetHeight);\r\n    var windowHeight = window.innerHeight || body.clientHeight;\r\n    var scrollSteps = Math.ceil(pageHeight / windowHeight);\r\n    var step = 0;\r\n    var dir = 'down';\r\n    var prevScrollDistance = 0;\r\n    var mydelay = 0;\r\n    var initialStep = true;\r\n    var animationCanRun = true;\r\n\r\n    // Manual scrolling stuff\r\n    var startPos = { x: 0, y: 0 };\r\n    var offsetPos = { x: 0, y: 0 };\r\n    var oldTransition = null;\r\n    var startTransform = null;\r\n    var newTransformY = 0;\r\n    var touchMoveTimer = null;\r\n    var maxTouchMoveDistance = document.body.offsetHeight - window.innerHeight + 20;\r\n    var delayAfterManualTouch = 10;\r\n\r\n    // Add styles to prevent blurry text\r\n    document.body.style.backfaceVisibility = 'hidden';\r\n    document.body.style.webkitFontSmoothing = 'antialiased';\r\n    document.body.style.fontSmoothing = 'antialiased';\r\n    document.body.style.transform = 'translateZ(0)';\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchstart', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      animationCanRun = false;\r\n      touchMove = true;\r\n      startTransform = window.getComputedStyle(document.body).getPropertyValue('transform');\r\n\r\n      // Set start position of touchmove\r\n      startPos.y = e.touches[0].pageY;\r\n      \r\n      // Cache transition state\r\n      oldTransition = document.body.style.transition;\r\n      // Remove current transition and set transform to current position\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransform = startTransform + '';\r\n      document.body.style.transform = startTransform + '';\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'transform 0s linear';\r\n      document.body.style.transition = 'transform 0s linear';\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchmove', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      offsetPos.y = startPos.y - e.touches[0].pageY;\r\n      var lastTransformPos = startTransform.toLowerCase().split(',')[5];\r\n      if (lastTransformPos) {\r\n        lastTransformPos = lastTransformPos.replace(')', '');\r\n      }\r\n      lastTransformPos -= offsetPos.y;\r\n      newTransformY = lastTransformPos;\r\n      if (!isNaN(newTransformY) && newTransformY < 20 && newTransformY > -(maxTouchMoveDistance)) {\t\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, ' + newTransformY + ')';\r\n        document.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, ' + newTransformY + ')';\r\n      } else if (isNaN(newTransformY) && -offsetPos.y < 20 && -offsetPos.y > -(maxTouchMoveDistance)) {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -' + offsetPos.y + ')';\r\n        document.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -' + offsetPos.y + ')';\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (touchMoveTimer !== null) {\r\n        clearTimeout(touchMoveTimer)\r\n      }\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchend', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      touchMoveTimer = setTimeout(function() {\r\n        animationCanRun = true;\r\n        clearTimeout(touchMoveTimer);\r\n        restartAnimation();\r\n      }, delayAfterManualTouch * 1000);\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    function fNew() {\r\n      if (scrollSteps <= 0 || windowHeight >= pageHeight) return;\r\n\t    if (!animationCanRun) return;\r\n\r\n      if (initialStep && step === 0) {\r\n        step = 1;\r\n        initialStep = false;\r\n      } else {\r\n        if (dir === 'down') {\r\n          if (step + 1 < scrollSteps) {\r\n            step++;\r\n          } else {\r\n            if (onlyOneDirection) {\r\n              step = 0;\r\n            } else {\r\n              step--;\r\n            }\r\n            dir = 'up';\r\n          }\r\n        } else if (dir === 'up') {\r\n          if (step - 1 >= 0) {\r\n            step--;\r\n          } else {\r\n            step++;\r\n            dir = 'down';\r\n          }\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      var curStepDestination = step * windowHeight;\r\n\r\n      if (step === scrollSteps - 1) {\r\n        var diff = pageHeight - ((step) * windowHeight);\r\n        realHeight = (step - 1) * windowHeight + diff + 20; // 20px safety margin\r\n        if (realHeight > 0) {\r\n          curStepDestination = realHeight;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      var speed = 3 / (210 / scrollVelocity)\r\n\r\n      var animationduration = Math.abs(curStepDestination - prevScrollDistance) / (630 * speed);\r\n      prevScrollDistance = curStepDestination;\r\n\r\n      if (onlyOneDirection && dir === 'up') {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'initial';\r\n        document.body.style.transition = 'initial';\r\n      } else {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'transform ' + animationduration + 's linear';\r\n        document.body.style.transition = 'transform ' + animationduration + 's linear';\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'translateZ(0) translateY(-' + curStepDestination + 'px)';\r\n      document.body.style.transform = 'translateZ(0) translateY(-' + curStepDestination + 'px)';\r\n\r\n      var newDelay = 0;\r\n      mydelay = pageDelay;\r\n\r\n      if (dir === 'down') {\r\n        if (step === scrollSteps - 1) {\r\n          mydelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      } else {\r\n        if (step === 0) {\r\n          mydelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (onlyOneDirection && dir === 'up') {\r\n        newDelay = mydelay;\r\n      } else {\r\n        newDelay = mydelay + (animationduration * 1000);\r\n\t  }\r\n\t  if (!animationCanRun) return;\r\n      setTimeout(fNew, newDelay);\r\n    }\r\n    setTimeout(function () {\r\n      fNew();\r\n\t\t}, pageDelay);\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\tfunction restartAnimation() {\r\n\t\t\tdocument.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0)';\r\n\t\t\tdocument.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0)';\r\n\t\t\tstep = 0;\r\n\t\t\tdir = 'down';\r\n\t\t\tprevScrollDistance = 0;\r\n\t\t\tmydelay = 0;\r\n      initialStep = true;\r\n      setTimeout(function() {\r\n\t\t\t  fNew();\r\n      }, 500);\r\n\t\t}\r\n  }\r\n}\r\n</script>\r\n</body></html>",

         <p>Hilda-Gymnasium Pforzheim <span style=\"width:10px\">&nbsp;</span> D-75172, Kiehnlestraße 25<br />\r\n            Stundenplan 2022/23<span style=\"width:10px\">&nbsp;</span> <span OG</span></td><td class=\"list\" align=\"center\">&nbsp;</td></tr>\r\n</table>\r\n<p>\r\n<font size=\"3\" face=\"Arial\">\r\nPeriode10   17.1.2023   23.7.2020   Stundenplan 2022-23neu\r\n</font></center>\r\n\r\n<p><center><font face=\"Arial\" size=\"2\"><a href=\"http://www.untis.at\" target=\"_blank\" >Untis Stundenplan Software</a></font></center>\r\n</body><script language=\"JavaScript\">\r\n\r\n\r\nvar system = navigator.userAgent;\r\nvar scrollVelocity = 10;\r\nvar onlyOneDirection = true;\r\nvar pageDelay = 1000;\r\nvar pageStartEndDelay = 1000;\r\n\r\nif (system.toLowerCase().indexOf('smart-tv') !== -1) {\r\n  if (system.toLowerCase().indexOf('tizen 2.4.0') !== -1) {\r\n    document.body.style.height = '100%';\r\n    window.getComputedStyle(document.body).width;\r\n    var styles = window.getComputedStyle(document.body);\r\n    var scrollHeight = document.body.scrollHeight - (document.body.offsetHeight + parseFloat(styles['marginTop']) + parseFloat(styles['marginBottom']));\r\n    var pageHeight = document.body.offsetHeight;\r\n    var scrollStep = 3;\r\n    var reverseDirection = false;\r\n    var scrollDistance = -scrollStep;\r\n    var firstStart = true;\r\n\r\n    function f() {\r\n      if (scrollVelocity === 0) {\r\n        return;\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      window.scroll(0, scrollDistance);\r\n\r\n      var nextDelay = Math.round(210 / scrollVelocity);\r\n      if (!reverseDirection) {\r\n        scrollDistance += scrollStep;\r\n        if (scrollDistance >= scrollHeight) {\r\n          if (onlyOneDirection) {\r\n            scrollDistance = -scrollStep;\r\n          } else {\r\n            reverseDirection = true;\r\n          }\r\n          nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      } else {\r\n        scrollDistance -= scrollStep;\r\n        if (scrollDistance <= 1) {\r\n          reverseDirection = false;\r\n          nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (Math.abs(scrollDistance % pageHeight) < scrollStep && scrollDistance !== 0) {\r\n        nextDelay = pageDelay;\r\n      } else if (scrollDistance === 0) {\r\n        nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n      }\r\n      setTimeout(f, nextDelay);\r\n    }\r\n    requestAnimationFrame(f);\r\n  } else {\r\n\t// Automatic scrolling stuff\r\n    var body = document.body, html = document.documentElement;\r\n    var pageHeight = Math.max(body.scrollHeight, body.offsetHeight, html.clientHeight, html.scrollHeight, html.offsetHeight);\r\n    var windowHeight = window.innerHeight || body.clientHeight;\r\n    var scrollSteps = Math.ceil(pageHeight / windowHeight);\r\n    var step = 0;\r\n    var dir = 'down';\r\n    var prevScrollDistance = 0;\r\n    var mydelay = 0;\r\n    var initialStep = true;\r\n    var animationCanRun = true;\r\n\r\n    // Manual scrolling stuff\r\n    var startPos = { x: 0, y: 0 };\r\n    var offsetPos = { x: 0, y: 0 };\r\n    var oldTransition = null;\r\n    var startTransform = null;\r\n    var newTransformY = 0;\r\n    var touchMoveTimer = null;\r\n    var maxTouchMoveDistance = document.body.offsetHeight - window.innerHeight + 20;\r\n    var delayAfterManualTouch = 10;\r\n\r\n    // Add styles to prevent blurry text\r\n    document.body.style.backfaceVisibility = 'hidden';\r\n    document.body.style.webkitFontSmoothing = 'antialiased';\r\n    document.body.style.fontSmoothing = 'antialiased';\r\n    document.body.style.transform = 'translateZ(0)';\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchstart', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      animationCanRun = false;\r\n      touchMove = true;\r\n      startTransform = window.getComputedStyle(document.body).getPropertyValue('transform');\r\n\r\n      // Set start position of touchmove\r\n      startPos.y = e.touches[0].pageY;\r\n      \r\n      // Cache transition state\r\n      oldTransition = document.body.style.transition;\r\n      // Remove current transition and set transform to current position\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransform = startTransform + '';\r\n      document.body.style.transform = startTransform + '';\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'transform 0s linear';\r\n      document.body.style.transition = 'transform 0s linear';\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchmove', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      offsetPos.y = startPos.y - e.touches[0].pageY;\r\n      var lastTransformPos = startTransform.toLowerCase().split(',')[5];\r\n      if (lastTransformPos) {\r\n        lastTransformPos = lastTransformPos.replace(')', '');\r\n      }\r\n      lastTransformPos -= offsetPos.y;\r\n      newTransformY = lastTransformPos;\r\n      if (!isNaN(newTransformY) && newTransformY < 20 && newTransformY > -(maxTouchMoveDistance)) {\t\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, ' + newTransformY + ')';\r\n        document.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, ' + newTransformY + ')';\r\n      } else if (isNaN(newTransformY) && -offsetPos.y < 20 && -offsetPos.y > -(maxTouchMoveDistance)) {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -' + offsetPos.y + ')';\r\n        document.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -' + offsetPos.y + ')';\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (touchMoveTimer !== null) {\r\n        clearTimeout(touchMoveTimer)\r\n      }\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchend', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      touchMoveTimer = setTimeout(function() {\r\n        animationCanRun = true;\r\n        clearTimeout(touchMoveTimer);\r\n        restartAnimation();\r\n      }, delayAfterManualTouch * 1000);\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    function fNew() {\r\n      if (scrollSteps <= 0 || windowHeight >= pageHeight) return;\r\n\t    if (!animationCanRun) return;\r\n\r\n      if (initialStep && step === 0) {\r\n        step = 1;\r\n        initialStep = false;\r\n      } else {\r\n        if (dir === 'down') {\r\n          if (step + 1 < scrollSteps) {\r\n            step++;\r\n          } else {\r\n            if (onlyOneDirection) {\r\n              step = 0;\r\n            } else {\r\n              step--;\r\n            }\r\n            dir = 'up';\r\n          }\r\n        } else if (dir === 'up') {\r\n          if (step - 1 >= 0) {\r\n            step--;\r\n          } else {\r\n            step++;\r\n            dir = 'down';\r\n          }\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      var curStepDestination = step * windowHeight;\r\n\r\n      if (step === scrollSteps - 1) {\r\n        var diff = pageHeight - ((step) * windowHeight);\r\n        realHeight = (step - 1) * windowHeight + diff + 20; // 20px safety margin\r\n        if (realHeight > 0) {\r\n          curStepDestination = realHeight;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      var speed = 3 / (210 / scrollVelocity)\r\n\r\n      var animationduration = Math.abs(curStepDestination - prevScrollDistance) / (630 * speed);\r\n      prevScrollDistance = curStepDestination;\r\n\r\n      if (onlyOneDirection && dir === 'up') {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'initial';\r\n        document.body.style.transition = 'initial';\r\n      } else {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'transform ' + animationduration + 's linear';\r\n        document.body.style.transition = 'transform ' + animationduration + 's linear';\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'translateZ(0) translateY(-' + curStepDestination + 'px)';\r\n      document.body.style.transform = 'translateZ(0) translateY(-' + curStepDestination + 'px)';\r\n\r\n      var newDelay = 0;\r\n      mydelay = pageDelay;\r\n\r\n      if (dir === 'down') {\r\n        if (step === scrollSteps - 1) {\r\n          mydelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      } else {\r\n        if (step === 0) {\r\n          mydelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (onlyOneDirection && dir === 'up') {\r\n        newDelay = mydelay;\r\n      } else {\r\n        newDelay = mydelay + (animationduration * 1000);\r\n\t  }\r\n\t  if (!animationCanRun) return;\r\n      setTimeout(fNew, newDelay);\r\n    }\r\n    setTimeout(function () {\r\n      fNew();\r\n\t\t}, pageDelay);\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\tfunction restartAnimation() {\r\n\t\t\tdocument.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0)';\r\n\t\t\tdocument.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0)';\r\n\t\t\tstep = 0;\r\n\t\t\tdir = 'down';\r\n\t\t\tprevScrollDistance = 0;\r\n\t\t\tmydelay = 0;\r\n      initialStep = true;\r\n      setTimeout(function() {\r\n\t\t\t  fNew();\r\n      }, 500);\r\n\t\t}\r\n  }\r\n}\r\n</script>\r\n</body></html>",

OG</span></td><td class=\"list\" align=\"center\">&nbsp;</td></tr>\r\n</table>\r\n<p>\r\n<font size=\"3\" face=\"Arial\">\r\nPeriode10   17.1.2023   23.7.2020   Stundenplan 2022-23neu\r\n</font></center>\r\n\r\n<p><center><font face=\"Arial\" size=\"2\"><a href=\"http://www.untis.at\" target=\"_blank\" >Untis Stundenplan Software</a></font></center>\r\n</body><script language=\"JavaScript\">\r\n\r\n\r\nvar system = navigator.userAgent;\r\nvar scrollVelocity = 10;\r\nvar onlyOneDirection = true;\r\nvar pageDelay = 1000;\r\nvar pageStartEndDelay = 1000;\r\n\r\nif (system.toLowerCase().indexOf('smart-tv') !== -1) {\r\n  if (system.toLowerCase().indexOf('tizen 2.4.0') !== -1) {\r\n    document.body.style.height = '100%';\r\n    window.getComputedStyle(document.body).width;\r\n    var styles = window.getComputedStyle(document.body);\r\n    var scrollHeight = document.body.scrollHeight - (document.body.offsetHeight + parseFloat(styles['marginTop']) + parseFloat(styles['marginBottom']));\r\n    var pageHeight = document.body.offsetHeight;\r\n    var scrollStep = 3;\r\n    var reverseDirection = false;\r\n    var scrollDistance = -scrollStep;\r\n    var firstStart = true;\r\n\r\n    function f() {\r\n      if (scrollVelocity === 0) {\r\n        return;\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      window.scroll(0, scrollDistance);\r\n\r\n      var nextDelay = Math.round(210 / scrollVelocity);\r\n      if (!reverseDirection) {\r\n        scrollDistance += scrollStep;\r\n        if (scrollDistance >= scrollHeight) {\r\n          if (onlyOneDirection) {\r\n            scrollDistance = -scrollStep;\r\n          } else {\r\n            reverseDirection = true;\r\n          }\r\n          nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      } else {\r\n        scrollDistance -= scrollStep;\r\n        if (scrollDistance <= 1) {\r\n          reverseDirection = false;\r\n          nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (Math.abs(scrollDistance % pageHeight) < scrollStep && scrollDistance !== 0) {\r\n        nextDelay = pageDelay;\r\n      } else if (scrollDistance === 0) {\r\n        nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n      }\r\n      setTimeout(f, nextDelay);\r\n    }\r\n    requestAnimationFrame(f);\r\n  } else {\r\n\t// Automatic scrolling stuff\r\n    var body = document.body, html = document.documentElement;\r\n    var pageHeight = Math.max(body.scrollHeight, body.offsetHeight, html.clientHeight, html.scrollHeight, html.offsetHeight);\r\n    var windowHeight = window.innerHeight || body.clientHeight;\r\n    var scrollSteps = Math.ceil(pageHeight / windowHeight);\r\n    var step = 0;\r\n    var dir = 'down';\r\n    var prevScrollDistance = 0;\r\n    var mydelay = 0;\r\n    var initialStep = true;\r\n    var animationCanRun = true;\r\n\r\n    // Manual scrolling stuff\r\n    var startPos = { x: 0, y: 0 };\r\n    var offsetPos = { x: 0, y: 0 };\r\n    var oldTransition = null;\r\n    var startTransform = null;\r\n    var newTransformY = 0;\r\n    var touchMoveTimer = null;\r\n    var maxTouchMoveDistance = document.body.offsetHeight - window.innerHeight + 20;\r\n    var delayAfterManualTouch = 10;\r\n\r\n    // Add styles to prevent blurry text\r\n    document.body.style.backfaceVisibility = 'hidden';\r\n    document.body.style.webkitFontSmoothing = 'antialiased';\r\n    document.body.style.fontSmoothing = 'antialiased';\r\n    document.body.style.transform = 'translateZ(0)';\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchstart', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      animationCanRun = false;\r\n      touchMove = true;\r\n      startTransform = window.getComputedStyle(document.body).getPropertyValue('transform');\r\n\r\n      // Set start position of touchmove\r\n      startPos.y = e.touches[0].pageY;\r\n      \r\n      // Cache transition state\r\n      oldTransition = document.body.style.transition;\r\n      // Remove current transition and set transform to current position\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransform = startTransform + '';\r\n      document.body.style.transform = startTransform + '';\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'transform 0s linear';\r\n      document.body.style.transition = 'transform 0s linear';\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchmove', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      offsetPos.y = startPos.y - e.touches[0].pageY;\r\n      var lastTransformPos = startTransform.toLowerCase().split(',')[5];\r\n      if (lastTransformPos) {\r\n        lastTransformPos = lastTransformPos.replace(')', '');\r\n      }\r\n      lastTransformPos -= offsetPos.y;\r\n      newTransformY = lastTransformPos;\r\n      if (!isNaN(newTransformY) && newTransformY < 20 && newTransformY > -(maxTouchMoveDistance)) {\t\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, ' + newTransformY + ')';\r\n        document.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, ' + newTransformY + ')';\r\n      } else if (isNaN(newTransformY) && -offsetPos.y < 20 && -offsetPos.y > -(maxTouchMoveDistance)) {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -' + offsetPos.y + ')';\r\n        document.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -' + offsetPos.y + ')';\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (touchMoveTimer !== null) {\r\n        clearTimeout(touchMoveTimer)\r\n      }\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchend', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      touchMoveTimer = setTimeout(function() {\r\n        animationCanRun = true;\r\n        clearTimeout(touchMoveTimer);\r\n        restartAnimation();\r\n      }, delayAfterManualTouch * 1000);\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    function fNew() {\r\n      if (scrollSteps <= 0 || windowHeight >= pageHeight) return;\r\n\t    if (!animationCanRun) return;\r\n\r\n      if (initialStep && step === 0) {\r\n        step = 1;\r\n        initialStep = false;\r\n      } else {\r\n        if (dir === 'down') {\r\n          if (step + 1 < scrollSteps) {\r\n            step++;\r\n          } else {\r\n            if (onlyOneDirection) {\r\n              step = 0;\r\n            } else {\r\n              step--;\r\n            }\r\n            dir = 'up';\r\n          }\r\n        } else if (dir === 'up') {\r\n          if (step - 1 >= 0) {\r\n            step--;\r\n          } else {\r\n            step++;\r\n            dir = 'down';\r\n          }\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      var curStepDestination = step * windowHeight;\r\n\r\n      if (step === scrollSteps - 1) {\r\n        var diff = pageHeight - ((step) * windowHeight);\r\n        realHeight = (step - 1) * windowHeight + diff + 20; // 20px safety margin\r\n        if (realHeight > 0) {\r\n          curStepDestination = realHeight;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      var speed = 3 / (210 / scrollVelocity)\r\n\r\n      var animationduration = Math.abs(curStepDestination - prevScrollDistance) / (630 * speed);\r\n      prevScrollDistance = curStepDestination;\r\n\r\n      if (onlyOneDirection && dir === 'up') {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'initial';\r\n        document.body.style.transition = 'initial';\r\n      } else {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'transform ' + animationduration + 's linear';\r\n        document.body.style.transition = 'transform ' + animationduration + 's linear';\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'translateZ(0) translateY(-' + curStepDestination + 'px)';\r\n      document.body.style.transform = 'translateZ(0) translateY(-' + curStepDestination + 'px)';\r\n\r\n      var newDelay = 0;\r\n      mydelay = pageDelay;\r\n\r\n      if (dir === 'down') {\r\n        if (step === scrollSteps - 1) {\r\n          mydelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      } else {\r\n        if (step === 0) {\r\n          mydelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (onlyOneDirection && dir === 'up') {\r\n        newDelay = mydelay;\r\n      } else {\r\n        newDelay = mydelay + (animationduration * 1000);\r\n\t  }\r\n\t  if (!animationCanRun) return;\r\n      setTimeout(fNew, newDelay);\r\n    }\r\n    setTimeout(function () {\r\n      fNew();\r\n\t\t}, pageDelay);\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\tfunction restartAnimation() {\r\n\t\t\tdocument.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0)';\r\n\t\t\tdocument.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0)';\r\n\t\t\tstep = 0;\r\n\t\t\tdir = 'down';\r\n\t\t\tprevScrollDistance = 0;\r\n\t\t\tmydelay = 0;\r\n      initialStep = true;\r\n      setTimeout(function() {\r\n\t\t\t  fNew();\r\n      }, 500);\r\n\t\t}\r\n  }\r\n}\r\n</script>\r\n</body></html>",
    "2023-01-16": "<html><head><meta http-equiv=\"Content-Type\" content=\"text/html;\"><style type=\"text/css\">\r\n\r\nbody { margin-top: 0px; margin-left: 20px; margin-right: 20px;\r\nbackground: 2022-23neu\r\n</font></center>\r\n\r\n<p><center><font face=\"Arial\" size=\"2\"><a href=\"http://www.untis.at\" target=\"_blank\" >Untis Stundenplan Software</a></font></center>\r\n</body><script language=\"JavaScript\">\r\n\r\n\r\nvar system = navigator.userAgent;\r\nvar scrollVelocity = 10;\r\nvar onlyOneDirection = true;\r\nvar pageDelay = 1000;\r\nvar pageStartEndDelay = 1000;\r\n\r\nif (system.toLowerCase().indexOf('smart-tv') !== -1) {\r\n  if (system.toLowerCase().indexOf('tizen 2.4.0') !== -1) {\r\n    document.body.style.height = '100%';\r\n    window.getComputedStyle(document.body).width;\r\n    var styles = window.getComputedStyle(document.body);\r\n    var scrollHeight = document.body.scrollHeight - (document.body.offsetHeight + parseFloat(styles['marginTop']) + parseFloat(styles['marginBottom']));\r\n    var pageHeight = document.body.offsetHeight;\r\n    var scrollStep = 3;\r\n    var reverseDirection = false;\r\n    var scrollDistance = -scrollStep;\r\n    var firstStart = true;\r\n\r\n    function f() {\r\n      if (scrollVelocity === 0) {\r\n        return;\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      window.scroll(0, scrollDistance);\r\n\r\n      var nextDelay = Math.round(210 / scrollVelocity);\r\n      if (!reverseDirection) {\r\n        scrollDistance += scrollStep;\r\n        if (scrollDistance >= scrollHeight) {\r\n          if (onlyOneDirection) {\r\n            scrollDistance = -scrollStep;\r\n          } else {\r\n            reverseDirection = true;\r\n          }\r\n          nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      } else {\r\n        scrollDistance -= scrollStep;\r\n        if (scrollDistance <= 1) {\r\n          reverseDirection = false;\r\n          nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (Math.abs(scrollDistance % pageHeight) < scrollStep && scrollDistance !== 0) {\r\n        nextDelay = pageDelay;\r\n      } else if (scrollDistance === 0) {\r\n        nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n      }\r\n      setTimeout(f, nextDelay);\r\n    }\r\n    requestAnimationFrame(f);\r\n  } else {\r\n\t// Automatic scrolling stuff\r\n    var body = document.body, html = document.documentElement;\r\n    var pageHeight = Math.max(body.scrollHeight, body.offsetHeight, html.clientHeight, html.scrollHeight, html.offsetHeight);\r\n    var windowHeight = window.innerHeight || body.clientHeight;\r\n    var scrollSteps = Math.ceil(pageHeight / windowHeight);\r\n    var step = 0;\r\n    var dir = 'down';\r\n    var prevScrollDistance = 0;\r\n    var mydelay = 0;\r\n    var initialStep = true;\r\n    var animationCanRun = true;\r\n\r\n    // Manual scrolling stuff\r\n    var startPos = { x: 0, y: 0 };\r\n    var offsetPos = { x: 0, y: 0 };\r\n    var oldTransition = null;\r\n    var startTransform = null;\r\n    var newTransformY = 0;\r\n    var touchMoveTimer = null;\r\n    var maxTouchMoveDistance = document.body.offsetHeight - window.innerHeight + 20;\r\n    var delayAfterManualTouch = 10;\r\n\r\n    // Add styles to prevent blurry text\r\n    document.body.style.backfaceVisibility = 'hidden';\r\n    document.body.style.webkitFontSmoothing = 'antialiased';\r\n    document.body.style.fontSmoothing = 'antialiased';\r\n    document.body.style.transform = 'translateZ(0)';\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchstart', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      animationCanRun = false;\r\n      touchMove = true;\r\n      startTransform = window.getComputedStyle(document.body).getPropertyValue('transform');\r\n\r\n      // Set start position of touchmove\r\n      startPos.y = e.touches[0].pageY;\r\n      \r\n      // Cache transition state\r\n      oldTransition = document.body.style.transition;\r\n      // Remove current transition and set transform to current position\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransform = startTransform + '';\r\n      document.body.style.transform = startTransform + '';\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'transform 0s linear';\r\n      document.body.style.transition = 'transform 0s linear';\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchmove', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      offsetPos.y = startPos.y - e.touches[0].pageY;\r\n      var lastTransformPos = startTransform.toLowerCase().split(',')[5];\r\n      if (lastTransformPos) {\r\n        lastTransformPos = lastTransformPos.replace(')', '');\r\n      }\r\n      lastTransformPos -= offsetPos.y;\r\n      newTransformY = lastTransformPos;\r\n      if (!isNaN(newTransformY) && newTransformY < 20 && newTransformY > -(maxTouchMoveDistance)) {\t\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, ' + newTransformY + ')';\r\n        document.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, ' + newTransformY + ')';\r\n      } else if (isNaN(newTransformY) && -offsetPos.y < 20 && -offsetPos.y > -(maxTouchMoveDistance)) {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -' + offsetPos.y + ')';\r\n        document.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -' + offsetPos.y + ')';\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (touchMoveTimer !== null) {\r\n        clearTimeout(touchMoveTimer)\r\n      }\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchend', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      touchMoveTimer = setTimeout(function() {\r\n        animationCanRun = true;\r\n        clearTimeout(touchMoveTimer);\r\n        restartAnimation();\r\n      }, delayAfterManualTouch * 1000);\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    function fNew() {\r\n      if (scrollSteps <= 0 || windowHeight >= pageHeight) return;\r\n\t    if (!animationCanRun) return;\r\n\r\n      if (initialStep && step === 0) {\r\n        step = 1;\r\n        initialStep = false;\r\n      } else {\r\n        if (dir === 'down') {\r\n          if (step + 1 < scrollSteps) {\r\n            step++;\r\n          } else {\r\n            if (onlyOneDirection) {\r\n              step = 0;\r\n            } else {\r\n              step--;\r\n            }\r\n            dir = 'up';\r\n          }\r\n        } else if (dir === 'up') {\r\n          if (step - 1 >= 0) {\r\n            step--;\r\n          } else {\r\n            step++;\r\n            dir = 'down';\r\n          }\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      var curStepDestination = step * windowHeight;\r\n\r\n      if (step === scrollSteps - 1) {\r\n        var diff = pageHeight - ((step) * windowHeight);\r\n        realHeight = (step - 1) * windowHeight + diff + 20; // 20px safety margin\r\n        if (realHeight > 0) {\r\n          curStepDestination = realHeight;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      var speed = 3 / (210 / scrollVelocity)\r\n\r\n      var animationduration = Math.abs(curStepDestination - prevScrollDistance) / (630 * speed);\r\n      prevScrollDistance = curStepDestination;\r\n\r\n      if (onlyOneDirection && dir === 'up') {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'initial';\r\n        document.body.style.transition = 'initial';\r\n      } else {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'transform ' + animationduration + 's linear';\r\n        document.body.style.transition = 'transform ' + animationduration + 's linear';\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'translateZ(0) translateY(-' + curStepDestination + 'px)';\r\n      document.body.style.transform = 'translateZ(0) translateY(-' + curStepDestination + 'px)';\r\n\r\n      var newDelay = 0;\r\n      mydelay = pageDelay;\r\n\r\n      if (dir === 'down') {\r\n        if (step === scrollSteps - 1) {\r\n          mydelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      } else {\r\n        if (step === 0) {\r\n          mydelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (onlyOneDirection && dir === 'up') {\r\n        newDelay = mydelay;\r\n      } else {\r\n        newDelay = mydelay + (animationduration * 1000);\r\n\t  }\r\n\t  if (!animationCanRun) return;\r\n      setTimeout(fNew, newDelay);\r\n    }\r\n    setTimeout(function () {\r\n      fNew();\r\n\t\t}, pageDelay);\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\tfunction restartAnimation() {\r\n\t\t\tdocument.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0)';\r\n\t\t\tdocument.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0)';\r\n\t\t\tstep = 0;\r\n\t\t\tdir = 'down';\r\n\t\t\tprevScrollDistance = 0;\r\n\t\t\tmydelay = 0;\r\n      initialStep = true;\r\n      setTimeout(function() {\r\n\t\t\t  fNew();\r\n      }, 500);\r\n\t\t}\r\n  }\r\n}\r\n</script>\r\n</body></html>",
    "2023-01-17": "<html><head><meta http-equiv=\"Content-Type\" content=\"text/html;\"><style type=\"text/css\">\r\n\r\nbody { margin-top: 0px; margin-left: 20px; margin-right: 20px;\r\nbackground: 2022-23neu\r\n</font></center>\r\n\r\n<p><center><font face=\"Arial\" size=\"2\"><a href=\"http://www.untis.at\" target=\"_blank\" >Untis Stundenplan Software</a></font></center>\r\n</body><script language=\"JavaScript\">\r\n\r\n\r\nvar system = navigator.userAgent;\r\nvar scrollVelocity = 10;\r\nvar onlyOneDirection = true;\r\nvar pageDelay = 1000;\r\nvar pageStartEndDelay = 1000;\r\n\r\nif (system.toLowerCase().indexOf('smart-tv') !== -1) {\r\n  if (system.toLowerCase().indexOf('tizen 2.4.0') !== -1) {\r\n    document.body.style.height = '100%';\r\n    window.getComputedStyle(document.body).width;\r\n    var styles = window.getComputedStyle(document.body);\r\n    var scrollHeight = document.body.scrollHeight - (document.body.offsetHeight + parseFloat(styles['marginTop']) + parseFloat(styles['marginBottom']));\r\n    var pageHeight = document.body.offsetHeight;\r\n    var scrollStep = 3;\r\n    var reverseDirection = false;\r\n    var scrollDistance = -scrollStep;\r\n    var firstStart = true;\r\n\r\n    function f() {\r\n      if (scrollVelocity === 0) {\r\n        return;\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      window.scroll(0, scrollDistance);\r\n\r\n      var nextDelay = Math.round(210 / scrollVelocity);\r\n      if (!reverseDirection) {\r\n        scrollDistance += scrollStep;\r\n        if (scrollDistance >= scrollHeight) {\r\n          if (onlyOneDirection) {\r\n            scrollDistance = -scrollStep;\r\n          } else {\r\n            reverseDirection = true;\r\n          }\r\n          nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      } else {\r\n        scrollDistance -= scrollStep;\r\n        if (scrollDistance <= 1) {\r\n          reverseDirection = false;\r\n          nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (Math.abs(scrollDistance % pageHeight) < scrollStep && scrollDistance !== 0) {\r\n        nextDelay = pageDelay;\r\n      } else if (scrollDistance === 0) {\r\n        nextDelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n      }\r\n      setTimeout(f, nextDelay);\r\n    }\r\n    requestAnimationFrame(f);\r\n  } else {\r\n\t// Automatic scrolling stuff\r\n    var body = document.body, html = document.documentElement;\r\n    var pageHeight = Math.max(body.scrollHeight, body.offsetHeight, html.clientHeight, html.scrollHeight, html.offsetHeight);\r\n    var windowHeight = window.innerHeight || body.clientHeight;\r\n    var scrollSteps = Math.ceil(pageHeight / windowHeight);\r\n    var step = 0;\r\n    var dir = 'down';\r\n    var prevScrollDistance = 0;\r\n    var mydelay = 0;\r\n    var initialStep = true;\r\n    var animationCanRun = true;\r\n\r\n    // Manual scrolling stuff\r\n    var startPos = { x: 0, y: 0 };\r\n    var offsetPos = { x: 0, y: 0 };\r\n    var oldTransition = null;\r\n    var startTransform = null;\r\n    var newTransformY = 0;\r\n    var touchMoveTimer = null;\r\n    var maxTouchMoveDistance = document.body.offsetHeight - window.innerHeight + 20;\r\n    var delayAfterManualTouch = 10;\r\n\r\n    // Add styles to prevent blurry text\r\n    document.body.style.backfaceVisibility = 'hidden';\r\n    document.body.style.webkitFontSmoothing = 'antialiased';\r\n    document.body.style.fontSmoothing = 'antialiased';\r\n    document.body.style.transform = 'translateZ(0)';\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchstart', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      animationCanRun = false;\r\n      touchMove = true;\r\n      startTransform = window.getComputedStyle(document.body).getPropertyValue('transform');\r\n\r\n      // Set start position of touchmove\r\n      startPos.y = e.touches[0].pageY;\r\n      \r\n      // Cache transition state\r\n      oldTransition = document.body.style.transition;\r\n      // Remove current transition and set transform to current position\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransform = startTransform + '';\r\n      document.body.style.transform = startTransform + '';\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'transform 0s linear';\r\n      document.body.style.transition = 'transform 0s linear';\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchmove', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      offsetPos.y = startPos.y - e.touches[0].pageY;\r\n      var lastTransformPos = startTransform.toLowerCase().split(',')[5];\r\n      if (lastTransformPos) {\r\n        lastTransformPos = lastTransformPos.replace(')', '');\r\n      }\r\n      lastTransformPos -= offsetPos.y;\r\n      newTransformY = lastTransformPos;\r\n      if (!isNaN(newTransformY) && newTransformY < 20 && newTransformY > -(maxTouchMoveDistance)) {\t\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, ' + newTransformY + ')';\r\n        document.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, ' + newTransformY + ')';\r\n      } else if (isNaN(newTransformY) && -offsetPos.y < 20 && -offsetPos.y > -(maxTouchMoveDistance)) {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -' + offsetPos.y + ')';\r\n        document.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -' + offsetPos.y + ')';\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (touchMoveTimer !== null) {\r\n        clearTimeout(touchMoveTimer)\r\n      }\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    window.addEventListener('touchend', function(e) {\r\n      e.preventDefault();\r\n      touchMoveTimer = setTimeout(function() {\r\n        animationCanRun = true;\r\n        clearTimeout(touchMoveTimer);\r\n        restartAnimation();\r\n      }, delayAfterManualTouch * 1000);\r\n    }, { passive: false });\r\n\r\n    function fNew() {\r\n      if (scrollSteps <= 0 || windowHeight >= pageHeight) return;\r\n\t    if (!animationCanRun) return;\r\n\r\n      if (initialStep && step === 0) {\r\n        step = 1;\r\n        initialStep = false;\r\n      } else {\r\n        if (dir === 'down') {\r\n          if (step + 1 < scrollSteps) {\r\n            step++;\r\n          } else {\r\n            if (onlyOneDirection) {\r\n              step = 0;\r\n            } else {\r\n              step--;\r\n            }\r\n            dir = 'up';\r\n          }\r\n        } else if (dir === 'up') {\r\n          if (step - 1 >= 0) {\r\n            step--;\r\n          } else {\r\n            step++;\r\n            dir = 'down';\r\n          }\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      var curStepDestination = step * windowHeight;\r\n\r\n      if (step === scrollSteps - 1) {\r\n        var diff = pageHeight - ((step) * windowHeight);\r\n        realHeight = (step - 1) * windowHeight + diff + 20; // 20px safety margin\r\n        if (realHeight > 0) {\r\n          curStepDestination = realHeight;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      var speed = 3 / (210 / scrollVelocity)\r\n\r\n      var animationduration = Math.abs(curStepDestination - prevScrollDistance) / (630 * speed);\r\n      prevScrollDistance = curStepDestination;\r\n\r\n      if (onlyOneDirection && dir === 'up') {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'initial';\r\n        document.body.style.transition = 'initial';\r\n      } else {\r\n        document.body.style.webkitTransition = 'transform ' + animationduration + 's linear';\r\n        document.body.style.transition = 'transform ' + animationduration + 's linear';\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      document.body.style.webkitTransform = 'translateZ(0) translateY(-' + curStepDestination + 'px)';\r\n      document.body.style.transform = 'translateZ(0) translateY(-' + curStepDestination + 'px)';\r\n\r\n      var newDelay = 0;\r\n      mydelay = pageDelay;\r\n\r\n      if (dir === 'down') {\r\n        if (step === scrollSteps - 1) {\r\n          mydelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      } else {\r\n        if (step === 0) {\r\n          mydelay = pageStartEndDelay;\r\n        }\r\n      }\r\n\r\n      if (onlyOneDirection && dir === 'up') {\r\n        newDelay = mydelay;\r\n      } else {\r\n        newDelay = mydelay + (animationduration * 1000);\r\n\t  }\r\n\t  if (!animationCanRun) return;\r\n      setTimeout(fNew, newDelay);\r\n    }\r\n    setTimeout(function () {\r\n      fNew();\r\n\t\t}, pageDelay);\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\tfunction restartAnimation() {\r\n\t\t\tdocument.body.style.webkitTransform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0)';\r\n\t\t\tdocument.body.style.transform = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0)';\r\n\t\t\tstep = 0;\r\n\t\t\tdir = 'down';\r\n\t\t\tprevScrollDistance = 0;\r\n\t\t\tmydelay = 0;\r\n      initialStep = true;\r\n      setTimeout(function() {\r\n\t\t\t  fNew();\r\n      }, 500);\r\n\t\t}\r\n  }\r\n}\r\n</script>\r\n</body></html>",
